name: kefir
description: Reactive Programming library for JavaScript inspired by Bacon.js and RxJS with focus on high performance and low memory usage

scripts.build-js: rollup -c ./configs/rollup.dev.js && rollup -c ./configs/rollup.esm.js && rollup -c ./configs/rollup.prod.js && cp kefir.js.flow dist/
scripts.deploy-docs: git checkout gh-pages && git merge master && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'build all' && git push && git checkout master
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-js && npm run build-docs
scripts.test: npm run prettier-check && rollup -c ./configs/rollup.dev.js && mocha && flow check

author: Roman Pominov <rpominov@gmail.com>
